casebody.data:
Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Lawrence.

[Cite as Disciplinary Counsel v. Lawrence (1996), 76 Ohio St.3d 1222.]

(No. 95-371 — Submitted and decided August 7, 1996.)

On Application for Reinstatement.

This cause came on for further consideration upon the filing of an application for reinstatement by respondent, David Alan Lawrence, Attorney Registration No. 0015293, last known address in Euclid, Ohio.

The court coming now to consider its order of July 5,1995, wherein pursuant to Gov.Bar R. V(6)(B), the court suspended respondent for one year, finds that respondent has substantially complied with that order and with the provisions of Gov.Bar R. V(10)(A). Therefore,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that David Alan Lawrence be, and hereby is, reinstated to the practice of law in the state of Ohio.

IT IS FURTHER ORDERED that the Clerk of this court issue certified copies of this order as provided for in Gov.Bar R. V(8)(D)(1), that publication be made as provided for in Gov.Bar R. V(8)(D)(2), and that respondent bear the costs of publication.

For earlier case, see Disciplinary Counsel v. Lawrence (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 420, 650 N.E.2d 867.

Mover, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Stratton, JJ., concur.
